name: ReleaseFlowGitVersion
description: Generates build version numbers from a Git repository based on Release Flow conventions
helpMarkDown: Add this task to generate build version numbers based on Release Flow conventions
author: Rich Tebb <rich@tebb.io>

inputs.name: sourceBranch
inputs.label: Source branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the branch on which the build is taking place, or from which the build was triggered, e.g. `$(Build.SourceBranch)`.

inputs.name: targetBranch
inputs.label: Target branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the build is triggered by a PR, specifies the target branch of the PR.

inputs.name: updateBuildNumber
inputs.label: Update build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether to update the build number to the calculated semantic version.

inputs.name: repoRoot
inputs.label: Repository root directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the directory where the Git repository is located.  Leave this empty to use the root of the repo for the current build, which is `$(Build.SourcesDirectory)`.

outputVariables.name: Major
outputVariables.description: The major version number.

outputVariables.name: Minor
outputVariables.description: The minor version number.

outputVariables.name: Patch
outputVariables.description: The patch version number.

outputVariables.name: MajorMinor
outputVariables.description: The major and minor version number, e.g. 1.2

outputVariables.name: MajorMinorPatch
outputVariables.description: The major, minor, and patch version number, e.g. 1.2.3

outputVariables.name: SemVer
outputVariables.description: The semantic version, e.g. 3.0.0-beta.1

outputVariables.name: LegacySemVer
outputVariables.description: The legact (v1) semantic version, e.g. 3.0.0-beta1

outputVariables.name: AssemblySemVer
outputVariables.description: The assembly version, e.g. 3.2.0.0

outputVariables.name: AssemblySemFileVer
outputVariables.description: The assemby file version, e.g. 3.2.1.0

outputVariables.name: InformationalVersion
outputVariables.description: The assembly informational version, e.g. 3.0.0-beta.1+1.Branch.release/3.0.0.Sha.28c853159a46b5a87e6cc9c4f6e940c59d6bc68a

outputVariables.name: BranchName
outputVariables.description: The name of the branch or tag that triggered the build, e.g. release/3.0

outputVariables.name: EscapedBranchName
outputVariables.description: The branch name, escaped for SemVer compatibility e.g. release-3.0

outputVariables.name: BuildType
outputVariables.description: The build type that was inferred from the source branch and repository state. One of: alpha, beta, working-branch, pull-request, release

outputVariables.name: Sha
outputVariables.description: The hash of the commit that triggered the build.

outputVariables.name: ShortSha
outputVariables.description: The abbreviated Git hash of the commit that triggered the build.

outputVariables.name: CommitDate
outputVariables.description: The date and time of the commit that triggered the build in ISO 8601 standard format, e.g. 2020-02-07T15:52:51.000Z.

outputVariables.name: CommitsSinceVersionSource
outputVariables.description: The number of commits on the ancestry path between the current commit and the last version source.

outputVariables.name: CommitsSinceVersionSourcePadded
outputVariables.description: Number of commits since version source padded to 4 digits, e.g. 0001

outputVariables.name: VersionSourceSha
outputVariables.description: The Git hash of the commit that was identified as the version source.

outputVariables.name: PreReleaseLabel
outputVariables.description: The pre-release label that was inferred from the source branch and repository state.

outputVariables.name: PreReleaseTag
outputVariables.description: The pre-release tag.

outputVariables.name: PreReleaseTagWithDash
outputVariables.description: The pre-release tag, prefixed with a dash.

outputVariables.name: PreReleaseNumber
outputVariables.description: The pre-release number.

outputVariables.name: FullBuildMetaData
outputVariables.description: The full build metadata, e.g. 1.Branch.release/3.0.0.Sha.28c853159a46b5a87e6cc9c4f6e940c59d6bc68a

outputVariables.name: NuGetVersion
outputVariables.description: The legacy NuGet-compatible version, e.g. 3.0.0-beta0001

outputVariables.name: NuGetPreReleaseTag
outputVariables.description: The legacy NuGet-compatible pre-release tag, e.g. beta0001
